scriptedContentFragment.name: ${resource:SEO_Name}
scriptedContentFragment.configuration: <propertyGroup id="options" labelResourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" labelResourceName="Title" defaultValue="${resource:Title}" dataType="String" template="core_v2_tokenizedString" /> <property id="pageTitle" labelResourceName="PageTitle" descriptionResourceName="PageTitle_Description" dataType="String" /> <property id="metaKeywords" labelResourceName="MetaKeywords" descriptionResourceName="MetaKeywords_Description" dataType="String" /> <property id="metaDescription" labelResourceName="MetaDescription" descriptionResourceName="MetaDescription_Description" dataType="String" /> <property id="canonicalUrl" labelResourceName="CanonicalUrl" descriptionResourceName="CanonicalUrl_Description" dataType="Url" /> <property id="enableCanonicalUrlQueryStringRegistrations" labelResourceName="EnableCanonicalUrlQueryStringRegistrations" descriptionResourceName="EnableCanonicalUrlQueryStringRegistrations_Description" dataType="string" defaultValue="true"> <propertyValue labelText="Enable" value="true" propertiesToShow="canonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore" /> <propertyValue labelText="Disable" value="false" propertiesToHide="canonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore" /> </property> <property id="canonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore" labelResourceName="CanonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore" descriptionResourceName="CanonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore_Description" dataType="String" rows="10" defaultValue="" /> </propertyGroup> <propertyGroup id="openGraph" labelResourceName="OpenGraph"> <property id="openGraphTitle" labelResourceName="OpenGraphTitle" descriptionResourceName="OpenGraphTitle_Description" dataType="String" /> <property id="openGraphDescription" labelResourceName="OpenGraphDescription" descriptionResourceName="OpenGraphDescription_Description" dataType="String" /> <property id="openGraphImage" labelResourceName="OpenGraphImage" descriptionResourceName="OpenGraphImage_Description" dataType="Url" allowLocal="true" allowRemote="false"> <propertyRule name="extensionvalidation" validExtensions="gif,jpg,jpeg,png" /> </property> </propertyGroup>
scriptedContentFragment.languageResources: <language key="en-us"> <resource name="CanonicalUrl">Canonical URL</resource> <resource name="CanonicalUrl_Description">If specified this will set the URL used in the canonical link tag.</resource> <resource name="CanonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore">Query Key Canonical URL Registrations to Ignore</resource> <resource name="CanonicalUrlQueryStringKeysToIgnore_Description">Identify query string keys, one per line, to ignore when generating the canonical URL.</resource> <resource name="EnableCanonicalUrlQueryStringRegistrations">Query Key Canonical URL Registrations</resource> <resource name="EnableCanonicalUrlQueryStringRegistrations_Description">When enabled, widgets on the page can register query string keys to be added to the canonical URL (for example, page indexes).</resource> <resource name="If specified this will override the default url used in the canonical link tag. By default the canonical url is the page's current base url."></resource> <resource name="MetaDescription">Meta Description</resource> <resource name="MetaDescription_Description">Should describe the page's content and will be placed in the description meta tag.</resource> <resource name="MetaKeywords">Meta Keywords</resource> <resource name="MetaKeywords_Description">A comma separated list of keywords that will be placed in the keywords meta tag.</resource> <resource name="OpenGraph">Open Graph</resource> <resource name="OpenGraphDescription">Description</resource> <resource name="OpenGraphDescription_Description">The description to be used in an Open Graph meta tag. If not specified no tag will be rendered.</resource> <resource name="OpenGraphImage">Image</resource> <resource name="OpenGraphImage_Description">An image to be used in the open graph meta tag. If not specified no tag will be rendered.</resource> <resource name="OpenGraphTitle">Title</resource> <resource name="OpenGraphTitle_Description">The title to be used in an Open Graph meta tag. If not specified no tag will be rendered.</resource> <resource name="Options">Options</resource> <resource name="PageTitle">Page Title</resource> <resource name="PageTitle_Description">The text to be used in the title tag of this page. If not specified the page name will be used.</resource> <resource name="SEO_Description">Provides SEO Meta Data For Custom Content Pages</resource> <resource name="SEO_Name">SEO Meta Data for Content Pages</resource> <resource name="Title">SEO Meta Data for Content Pages</resource> </language>
